description:
In this course, Emiel Sleegers is going to be covering the basic workflow methods used within Marvelous Designer 3. Here he will be covering some over the very basics such as the user interface, and from there he will jump right into creating different cloth and fabric meshes for objects like shirts, pillows, and a bed comforter.

(Students - please look under Section 1 / Lecture 1 downloads for the source files associated with the lesson.)

More about the Instructor:

Emiel Sleegers is a self-taught 3d artist currently residing in the Netherlands. He's been teaching himself 3D art for the past 3-4 years, and has worked as a freelance artist on numerous unannounced projects. He's a lover of all things 3d and enjoys sharing the knowledge he has obtained with others eager to learn.
title: Learn to Create 3d Cloth and Fabrics with Marvelous Designer
